<div class="titleCont "><div class="page-title"><div class="title"><span class="flag fr w32"></span><span class="flag c24 fr "></span> <h1><span class="hideIfMobile">2022 &nbsp; » &nbsp; 109th </span>Tour de France</h1></div><div class="subtitle hide imob block"><h2>2022</h2></div><div class="clear"></div><div class="title-line2 hideIfMobile"><font class="blue">21 Stages</font> &nbsp; » &nbsp; <font class="red">Copenhagen &nbsp;›&nbsp; Paris (Champs-Élysées)</font> &nbsp; <font class="red" style="font-weight: normal; ">(3349.8km)</font></div></div><a class="toggleSideMenu" href="">menu</a></div>

<div class="page-content noSideNav">
<h2>Start</h2>
<div class=""><div class="borderbox w100">

<div class="mt30">
<h4>Sites</h4><ul class="simple-list list circle bluelink fs14">
